mcq.statement: Why is Gurdwara Panja Sahib considered particularly important?

options.a: It is the birthplace of Guru Nanak
options.b: It houses the original Sikh scriptures
options.c: It has Guru Nanak's handprint on a boulder

mcq.one_liner: Gurdwara Panja Sahib holds special significance because it is believed to bear the handprint of **Guru Nanak** on a boulder.
